headline: Marjorie Taylor Greene Plays Dumb
author: The Editorial Board
sentences:
This weekend she and Rep. Paul Gosar addressed a rally organized by Nick Fuentes, a fringe internet figure who has a long record of praising a coming “tidal wave of white identity.”
